roleset.name: keep alive by feeding, having recieved enough nutrients
roleset.note: NOURISH-V NOTES: Based on ECTB. Comparison to Verbnet subjugate-42.3. (from nourish.01-v)
NOURISHED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. (from nourished.01-j)

example.text: The Three Gorges of the Yangtze and the Chuoshui River nourished the imaginations of Taiwanese people.
example.arg: The Three Gorges of the Yangtze and the Chuoshui River

example.name: all args
example.text: Brenda nourished her body with organic raw and living foods.
example.arg: with organic raw and living foods

example.name: arg1
example.text: General Appearance : *PRO* healthy , alert , well developed , well nourished , cooperative , pleasant , in no apparent distress
